description: Sum of digits of first 10^n primes.
mathematica: NextPrime[ n_Integer ] := Module[ {k}, k = n + 1; While[ ! PrimeQ[ k ], k++ ]; k ]; c = d = p = q = 0; Do[ While[ d++; d <= 10^n, q = NextPrime[ q ]; p = p + Apply[ Plus, RealDigits[ q ][ [ 1 ] ] ]; If[ PrimeQ[ p ], c++ ] ]; d--; Print[ p ], {n, 0, 10}
